reviews.title: Program may not work with JB 4.1.2
reviews.comment: Program crashes whenever any item is selected under menu. Can not access settings, etc. Can not even rate the app under its menu selection.
reviews.author: Richard Delacalzada

reviews.title: Sijin Jose
reviews.comment: This Application looks like a good one and i guess it works well with many devices too.. But with my device( ICS 4.0.2 ), It doesn\'t work.. It shows the applications in the locked list but all the apps can be opened without any password.. I guess they need to work more on it and update the current version making it compatible for ICS too..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No!
reviews.comment: App doesn\'t work. And my virus detector found out that it can locate exactly where you are. For your safety please do not download.
reviews.author: Iezebel Mace

reviews.title: How to change the password ?
reviews.comment: How can we change the password ?   The app is free, but i am not able to change the password.  When i click on \"set password\", it takes me to password screen and prompts me to enter the old password. Once I enter it, it comes back to settings page!!  Hence I am not able to change the password.   Could someone please explain how to change the default password ?
reviews.author: siva mani

reviews.title: SGS3 Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I added a folder to my desktop to lock and the file browser in this can\'t find that folder. I also added an App to the locked apps that was on my desktop. That desktop app still fully functions without any password. This app does not work for the SGS 3. Also the Plug-Ins Market on it, never finishes loading, it is painful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hiding msgs
reviews.comment: This app won\'t let me hide my txt msgs. How do i get them locked if they are old msgs that i need saved. I would very much appreciate a msg back as soon as possible, if y\'all aren\'t busy...other than this lil problem everything works great. Thank y\'all  P.S. as soon as i can save my txt msgs ill rate as a 5 but until then 3 is a lil high of a rate but 2 is too low. Thank yall again, and hopefully y\'all can get it fixd fairly quickly...
